utilities
Class tic_toc

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--utilities.tic_toc
public class tic_toc
extends java.lang.Object

Overview
This class provides a simple method to print out elapsed times for calculations and other events. This class was designed to output how long a complex calculation takes to complete. If the calculation can be broken into runs or laps, this class provides a straitforward way to output how long each sub calculation takes to complete.

Version:
1.0 (October 2001)
Author:
Tony Held

start_timer

public static void start_timer(java.lang.String Message)
Start the calculation timer and display a default message to the console.

new_run

public static void new_run()
Start a new run. This will reset the laps to zero and increment the run number.

lap_time

public static void lap_time()
Indicate the completion of a lap. This will print the run and lap # of the calculation and increment the lap number.

lap_time

public static void lap_time(java.lang.String Message)
Indicate the completion of a lap and specify a message to print to the console. This will print the run and lap # of the calculation and increment the lap number.

end_timer

public static void end_timer()
Indicate the completion of all calculations. Completion time information will be printed to the console.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
This routine is used for debugging purposes only.
